name: fabric-get
title: Get
description: This activity fetches data by key from fabric ledger
author: Yueming Xu

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: state key of the record to fetch from ledger

inputs.name: privateCollection
inputs.description: name of private collection, or blank if not private data

outputs.name: message
outputs.description: serialized result string, or error message

outputs.name: key
outputs.description: state key of the returned record

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: the parsed JSON object corresponding to the record from ledger
